reviewText: I bought this DVD for my daughter and she loves it a lot. But you need to get a region-free DVD player to watch it because it is a region 2 DVD. I recommend this to all parents who is looking for a Japanese show for their daughter ~!!

I really enjoyed this concert, even having in mind I can't get a word in Japanese except 3-4 of them )) But likely I could find some subtitles in the net. Very professional work! Congratulations to Mana and her team! Very serious work at such a young age was a serious challenge and Mana successfully did this! My congratulations!
